snippet.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Witness the birth of a God. The coming of a Lord.
And follies better left forgotten.
In that forsaken place, blood must spill.

#ELDENRING Shadow of the Erdtree launches June 21, 2024.

Pre-order ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree: https://bnent.eu/EldenRing-SOTE
Join the official discord: https://fcld.ly/eldenring_discord

Follow ELDEN RING:
X: https://x.com/ELDENRING
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ELDENRING
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ELDENRINGOFFICIAL

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
X: https://x.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bandainamcoeu
